lead_paragraph: The New York Times Magazine will be led by Hugo Lindgren, the executive editor of Bloomberg Businessweek and an alumnus of New York magazine and George.
snippet: The New York Times Magazine will be led by Hugo Lindgren, the executive editor of Bloomberg Businessweek and an alumnus of New York magazine and George.

headline.main: The Times Names Editor for Magazine
headline.seo: Hugo Lindgren Is Named to Lead New York Times Magazine
